testcase.name: Bare Filter Processing
testcase.description: Test bare filters with no variable sets, such as may be used in a rendering linkbase and other XBRL modules. These tests have no variable sets.

variation.name: Test bare concept name filter.
variation.description: The filter begins with all facts in instance and produces a $result with just those matching the conceptName filter. The filterTests expression receives in $result a sequence with the two eg:a fact items from the source instance document.

result.filterTest: $result instance of element(eg:a)* and count( $result ) eq 2 and index-of( $result, 1000 ) and index-of( $result, 1500 )

variation.name: Test bare concept name filter and bare period filter.
variation.description: The filter begins with all facts in instance and produces a $result with just those matching the conceptName and period filters. The filterTests expression receives in $result a sequence with the one eg:a fact item from the source instance document.

result.filterTest: $result instance of element(eg:a)* and count( $result ) eq 1 $result eq 1500
